name: TERA: Totes the Portable Pet Bank
detailed_description: Totes, the portable pet bank, can hold up to 72 slots worth of treasure making it easy to collect and store items! This is an account-wide item that will unlock a 72-slot pet bank for all characters on your account. Remember, though—for pets to be strong enough to lug your stuff around, you have to keep them fed! This pet comes with a stack of three pet foods to get you started. Additional pet food can be purchased from merchants in-game.
